thread.title: Rafael Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals
thread.title_full: Rafael Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals

title: Rafael Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals
text:
You Are Here : Home » Sports » Tennis » Rafael Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals Rafael Nadal routs Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 to reach Shanghai semifinals AP [ Updated 16 Oct 2015, 17:42:21 ] 
Shanghai: Rafael Nadal beat a top-five player for the first time in more than a year by defeating Stan Wawrinka 6-2, 6-1 Friday to reach the semifinals of the Shanghai Masters. 
The fourth-seeded Wawrinka missed wildly on his groundstrokes throughout the match, finishing with 34 unforced errors. 
He was coming off a tough three-set victory over Marin Cilic in the quarterfinals that finished close to midnight the night before. 
Nadal hadn't won against a top-five player since last year's French Open final when he defeated No. 2 Novak Djokovic for his 14th Grand Slam title. 
Nadal will play Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in the semifinals on Saturday after the French player topped Kevin Anderson of South Africa 7-6 (6), 5-7, 6-4.
